abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL #137	INTRODUCED BY ALDERWOMAN SHARON TYUS An ordinance pertaining to vendors; repealing Ordinance 64712, approved on July 29, 1999, Ordinance 64569, approved on February 11, 1999, Ordinance 65061, approved on October 11, 2000, Ordinance 65347, approved November 28, 2001 and Ordinance 69636 approved on November ___, 2013; prohibiting street vendors within the City of St. Louis except within designated vending districts; establishing vending districts within the City of St. Louis; promulgating rules and regulations for vending within vending districts; containing definitions, a penalty clause, a severability clause and an emergency clause.
